head.title: SaxonC XML Workbench: XSLT 3.0, XQuery 3.1, XPath 3.1

ul.li: XSLT 3.0 against XML or JSON input or plain text input (treated as xs:string context item) or no input starting with xsl:template name="xsl:initial-template", all with support for creating and displaying various xsl:result-documents
XQuery 3.1 against XML or JSON input or plain text input (treated as xs:string context item) or no input
XPath 3.1 against XML or JSON input or plain text input (treated as xs:string context item) or no input
